subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Golf
lead_paragraph: He is golf’s most caustic commentator, but as Johnny Miller prepared for this year’s United States Open, he basked in the memory of his record eight-under-par 63 round during the 1973 Open.
snippet: He is golf’s most caustic commentator, but as Johnny Miller prepared for this year’s United States Open, he basked in the memory of his record eight-under-par 63 round during the 1973 Open.
